data.title: Discover
data.body: Interview users to understand their current process and workflow.

data.title: Ideate
data.body: Meet with stakeholders and developers to collaboratively generate design ideas.

data.title: Sketch
data.body: Consolidate the ideas into a sketch to communicate the design and functionality while gathering consensus.

data.title: Prototype
data.body: Create a responsive and clickable coded prototype built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

data.title: User Testing
data.body: Test the prototype using Usability Testing methods to gather thorough feedback.

data.title: Journey Mapping
data.body: Synthesize the feedback and map the users’ experience with the prototype to improve it in future iterations.

data.title: Refine
data.body: Refine and iterate on the design to further improve the userʼs experience.

data.title: Iterate
data.body: Deliver changes to the prototype and backlog improvements for the future.
